name: Bijaya Adhikari
content: Bijaya Adhikari, Ph.D. | Computer Science - College of Liberal Arts and Sciences | The University of Iowa Skip to main content Bijaya Adhikari, Ph.D. Assistant Professor Emeriti-Faculty Scholar Biography Research InterestsMy research interest lies in data mining and machine learning, with a focus on dynamical processes (e.g. spread of misinformation, diseases, failures) on large networks (e.g. web, population contact networks, critical infrastructures). My recent work include AI for influenza forecasting, e-commerce search and fraud detection, outbreak detection in hospitals, network embedding, community detection, and network summarization.As a member of the Computational Epidemiology Group, I primarily investigate problems motivated by public health such as propagation of diseases via contact network, forecasting outbreaks of infectious diseases, and designing optimal surveillance systems.Research Interests (Keywords)Graph Mining; Computational Epidemiology; Machine LearningSelected PublicationsEfficient and Effective Implicit Dynamic Graph Neural Network [PDF][CODE][SLIDES] Yongjian Zhong, Hieu Vu, Tianbao Yang, and Bijaya Adhikari.
